successes.title: The ultimate sleep sanctuary: Kokoon EEG headphones
successes.description: Sleep better with the world's first sleep sensing EEG headphones. Perfect peace and comfort with audio that responds to your sleep.

Pledges.description: A Kokoon Sleep Kit. Show your support for Kokoons mission to bring the world better sleep. Back and receive a leather Kokoon travel kit with Kokoon eye mask, sleep guide and travel pillow.
Early bird - 'Kokoon Light' wireless comfort headphone - Kokoon's without the sleep science, sensors and app. (RRP: $219)
'Kokoon Light' wireless comfort headphone - Kokoon's without the sleep science, sensors and app. (RRP: $219)
Early bird  - Get the Kokoon Bluetooth headphone. The worlds first sleep sensing headphone. (RRP: $319)
The Kokoon Bluetooth headphone. The worlds first sleep sensing headphone. (RRP: $319)
Limited edition - Kokoon Bluetooth headphone customized just for you with your message or initials laser etched on the headband leather.
The early bird couple. Get two Kokoon Bluetooth headphones. The worlds first sleep sensing headphone. (RRP: $638)

Kokoon developer package. Take advantage of Kokoon's audio and EEG to develop exciting new applications. Get access to Kokoon's EEG sensor and sleep stage API's and SDK's. We will list your application on our partner page when finished.
The Kokoon couple. Get two Kokoon Bluetooth headphones. The worlds first sleep sensing headphone. (RRP: $638)
Limited Edition Kokoon couple. Get two Kokoon Bluetooth headphones customized just for you and your partner with your message or initials laser etched on the headband leather.
Get five Kokoon Bluetooth headphones at our cheapest price. The worlds first sleep sensing headphone.

PRODUCT WORKSHOP - Come with a friend to our London office for a developer and product deep dive workshop day with our team. You will receive a Kokoon travel kit, Kokoon pj's, four Kokoon developer editions, early access to prototypes and direct IM support from the team.
